attributes.action: Close down of all Restaurants, Coffee shops and public places to contain COVID19
attributes.background: As there are a lot of vulnerable people that visit coffee shops, restaurants. pubs and public places, closing them down for at least 14 days, can help prevent the spread of the decease and lower the number of infected people. This can also help keep the staff members safe from the virus.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that pubs, cafes and restaurants are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here:  https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
